product_name: Benefit CosmeticsThe POREfessional Smooth Sip Lightweight Gel-Cream Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingSmooth the look of pores AND hydrate skin with this lightweight gel-cream moisturizer. The water-based formula feels refreshing, goes on smoothly, absorbs quickly and gives instant and all-day hydration. Skin feels soft and nourished, and texture looks smoother and more even over time.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly improves skin texture12-hour* hydrationLightweight gel-cream formula feels refreshing & absorbs quicklyClinically provenDermatologist-testedNon-comedogenicHydrating and skin-balancingGentle and suitable for all skin typesPart of Benefit's Pore Care collection - a collection specially developed to help minimize, clear, and smooth the look of poresKey IngredientsNiacinamide, a form of vitamin B3, helps smooth the look of poresCelery seed extract & flax seed extract, rich in omega-3 and peptides, help visibly improve skin texture & refine the look of poresSqualane & aloe leaf juice contribute to maintaining hydrationBisabolol helps skin feel comfortableSphingolipids, ceramide-like molecules, help preserve initial skin hydrationResearch ResultsAFTER 1 USE, 99% said skin is soft*AFTER 1 USE, 99% said skin is smooth*AFTER 1 USE, 99% said skin feels nourished*AFTER 1 MONTH, 99% said skin is smooth**AFTER 1 MONTH, 96% said skin texture looks more even***Self-evaluation by 115 participants after 1 use**Self-evaluation by 115 participants after 1 monthItem 2606914How To UseTIPS & TRICKS: Smooth it on!Apply to clean face & neck. Use daily AM & PM.Beauty Tip: Smooth on The POREfessional Primer (sold separately) after moisturizing for smoother-than-smooth skin.IngredientsAqua (Water), Propanediol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cellulose, Squalane, Maltitol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Bisabolol, Xanthan Gum, Parfum (Fragrance), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Hydroxide, Sclerotium Gum, Sorbitan Trioleate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Pullulan, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Saccharide Isomerate, Silica, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Sphingolipids, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Citric Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Citrate, Tocopherol. No 16589.Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: TIPS & TRICKS: Smooth it on!Apply to clean face & neck. Use daily AM & PM.Beauty Tip: Smooth on The POREfessional Primer (sold separately) after moisturizing for smoother-than-smooth skin.
ingredients: Tocopherol. No 16589.Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product
please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: Light, but strong celery smell
reviews.comments: This is light and airy, and doesn't cause any breakouts on my mildly sensitive skin, but like some other feedback has stated, it does have a strong celery smell, I don't use it every day because of that and not sure if I'll buy this again.

reviews.headline: Loved it in combination with the IT cc!!
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin & both products did not irritate me at all!  I very rarely wear makeup but I really liked how my skin felt & looked. Thank you to a sweet beautician (Sandra, I think her name was) at Ulta in Huntington Beach who helped me tremendously.

reviews.headline: light weight moisturizer
reviews.comments:
good scent, light weight, makes you feel 'clean' and non greasy. 
absorbs quickly

reviews.headline: not for me
reviews.comments: i have very oily yet dry skin (oily t zone) and this moosturizer was a hard no for me. its too watery so doesnt really feel like it does anything, i had to reapply a few times throughout the day

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Its very lightweight and doesnt make you feel greasy. Ive noticed clearer skin since using this. The smell is strong but not terrible.

reviews.headline: I have purchased this product x2
reviews.comments: I like this product,  thanks to Dawn my Eyebrow tech.

reviews.headline: Good moisturizer, smells like celery
reviews.comments:
I've been trying this for a couple of weeks. It's a good moisturizer for my normal skin, and does smooth things out a bit. Overall, nothing too special and I'll be going back to Belif.  

But it smells strongly of cooked celery. I noticed the smell as soon as I opened it, and it took a while to figure out what it smelled like. It was definitely a familiar smell. My husband hugged me and asked where I'd eaten chicken soup. He thought I'd either spilled some on my shirt or not brushed my teeth afterwards. 

Admittedly, few people will be that close to my face, but if they are I don't want them to think I smell like soup. The smell also hangs around a while. It dissipates somewhat after 15ish minutes, but it's still there and you'll get a whiff once in a while. 

I wouldn't recommend it unless you really like celery or soup.

reviews.headline: First time trying…
reviews.comments: I cant get over the terrible chemical smell

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: As a moisturizer the product is okay. I did not notice any benefit to my pores, the scent is a little odd, and I absolutely hate sticking my finger into the tin. Moisturizers should be pumps.

reviews.headline: Had to stop using it
reviews.comments: The smell is awful and set off my allergies.  I want the Total Moisture product back.

reviews.headline: Feels tight and not in a good way
reviews.comments: I was recommended this by a Benefit rep after choosing a neck cream. She suggested it would help moisturize after the acids. If anything it makes my skin feel tighter and more dry. I've only used it a few times and dont like how it feels on my skin — tight and sticky. I don't get the feeling any moisture is soaking in like I would usually expect. Disappointing as it was expensive!

reviews.headline: I like it!
reviews.comments: This product has done wonders for my skin. It's moisturizing and has improved my skin texture. I'm in my late 20s and this product does great for my skin. I will continue to purchase.

reviews.headline: Bring back total moisture!
reviews.comments: This is not comparable at all!  I use to buy rotal moisture once a month… this stuff is terrible compared to that!!!

reviews.headline: Blend in with makeup very well.
reviews.comments:
Lightweight - perfect for summer!

I can tell that my makeup looks more smoother.

reviews.headline: This works well
reviews.comments: This is a great moisturizer, a little goes a long way for sure.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again
reviews.comments: My facial skin became very dry after removing makeup, and this product turned it all around.

reviews.headline: No results
reviews.comments: I was talked into buying this by an employee, but it does nothing. Actually stings when I put it on, but not in a good way that gets results. Maybe it's just my experience.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Bought this as the Total Moisture Facial Cream was no longer available and was disappointed by how this felt. It stung when applied and did not feel moistirizing.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: A little goes a long way! I absolutely love this product for my oily skin and it makes my pores look much smaller.

reviews.headline: Definetly repurchase
reviews.comments: amazing product, came in small container but a little goes a long way! feels so good on skin

media.headline: So Hydrating & Skin is looking Poreless!

faceoff_positive.comments: I was gifted by benefit this POREfessional SMOOTH SIP Lightweight Gel-Cream Moisturizer! I can't say enough positive things about this product.  love the feeling of my face after applying this moisturizer! I apply this light-weight moisturizer on my face after cleansing my face in the morning. I then apply my makeup about 5-10 minutes after applying! There is no pulling or caking and my skin looks flawless! I feel it keeps my face hydrated all day long and keeps the texture of my face smooth after makeup has been applied!  I do apply twice daily. I first apply it in the AM and the second in the PM before bed. I take my makeup off and cleanse my face!  I am feeling the more I use it, the better it benefits my skin because how smooth it is becoming!  I'm not getting those dry spots I previously had on my cheeks anymore and my face stays hydrated longe! I would recommend this moisturizer to everyone!
faceoff_positive.headline: Incredible Pore Moisturizer!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I've been trying this for a couple of weeks. It's a good moisturizer for my normal skin, and does smooth things out a bit. Overall, nothing too special and I'll be going back to Belif.  

But it smells strongly of cooked celery. I noticed the smell as soon as I opened it, and it took a while to figure out what it smelled like. It was definitely a familiar smell. My husband hugged me and asked where I'd eaten chicken soup. He thought I'd either spilled some on my shirt or not brushed my teeth afterwards. 

Admittedly, few people will be that close to my face, but if they are I don't want them to think I smell like soup. The smell also hangs around a while. It dissipates somewhat after 15ish minutes, but it's still there and you'll get a whiff once in a while. 

I wouldn't recommend it unless you really like celery or soup.
